title.rendered: Crafted smoked sausage, bean and olive casserole

content.rendered:
Crafted smoked sausage, bean and olive casserole

Ingredients

Ingredients
1 packet Fry’s Artisan Mediterranean Sausages (6 x 50g), each cut into 3
15ml (1 Tbsp) oil
1 onion, finely chopped
5ml (1 tsp) crushed garlic
1 tin baked beans
62ml (¼ cup) green olives, halved
10 cherry tomatoes, halved
Salt and pepper, to taste
Cooked rice, to serve

Directions

Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the onion and garlic until soft.

Add the Sausages and fry for 2 minutes.

Add the remaining ingredients, turn down the heat and simmer for 5 minutes, stirring.

Serve with cooked rice.
